data.comment: Bas Nijhuis starts the match. Alkmaar with the kick-off in Alkmaar.
Jesper Karlsson is on target to give Alkmaar a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 23, Vitesse make their first substitution with Thomas Bruns replacing Sondre Tronstad.
It's now 2-0 in Alkmaar as Myron Boadu scores for Alkmaar.
Owen Wijndal with an assist there.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Vitesse have kicked-off the second half at AFAS Stadion.
Goal! Lois Openda pulls one back to make it 2-1.
In the minute 53, Pascal Jansen (Alkmaar) has taken off Timo Letschert who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Zakaria Aboukhlal is the replacement.
The away team replace Riechedly Bazoer with Thomas Buitink.
Ferdy Druijf is replacing Myron Boadu for Alkmaar at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 75, Ferdy Druijf puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
Yukinari Sugawara instrumental with a fine assist.
The away team have replaced Maximilian Wittek with Million Manhoef. This is the third substitution made today by Thomas Letsch.
In the minute 79, Armando Broja is on a sub for Lois Openda for Vitesse.
Pascal Jansen (Alkmaar) is making a third substitution, with Hakon Evjen replacing Jesper Karlsson.
The match is over. Final score 3-1.
